name: Gospel Starter (14 days)
description: Key passages about Jesus, salvation, and new life.

name: John in 21 Days
description: Read the Gospel of John, one chapter per day.

name: New Testament in 90 Days
description: A steady through-read of the New Testament (about 2–3 chapters/day).

name: Harmony of the Gospels (40 days)
description: Key events across the four Gospels.

name: Praying the Psalms (30 days)
description: Pray a psalm a day; add a short NT verse.

name: Attributes of God (21 days)
description: Holiness, love, justice, mercy, immutability, and more.
